LanguageData.pfc_percentWealthBuildings_desc: Percentage of building wealth used.\n\n0-200%, Vanilla = 100%
LanguageData.pfc_percentWealthItems_desc: Percentage of item wealth used.\n\n0-200%, Vanilla = 100%
LanguageData.pfc_percentPowerAnimals_desc: Percentage of animal combat power used.\n\n0-200%, Vanilla = 100%
LanguageData.pfc_combatCapable_desc: When enabled, only pawns capable of fighting will be included in the threat calculation.\n\nVanilla = Disabled
